    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Set<RoleResource> getRoles(RoleResource primaryRole)
      Get all roles granted to the supplied Role, including both directly granted and inherited roles.
      static boolean hasSuperuserStatus(RoleResource role)
      Returns true if the supplied role or any other role granted to it (directly or indirectly) has superuser status.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • getRoles

        public static java.util.Set<RoleResource> getRoles(RoleResource primaryRole)
        Get all roles granted to the supplied Role, including both directly granted and inherited roles. The returned roles may be cached if roles_validity_in_ms > 0
        Parameters:
        primaryRole - the Role
        Returns:
        set of all granted Roles for the primary Role

      • hasSuperuserStatus

        public static boolean hasSuperuserStatus(RoleResource role)
        Returns true if the supplied role or any other role granted to it (directly or indirectly) has superuser status.
        Parameters:
        role - the primary role
        Returns:
        true if the role has superuser status, false otherwise
